metadata.title: CVE-2019-11008 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In GraphicsMagick 1.4 snapshot-20190322 Q8, there is a heap-based bufferoverflow in the function WriteXWDImage of coders/xwd.c, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted image file.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
